title: How to Change the Font Size in Python Shell

steps.title: Open the Python shell.
steps.content: Open the Python shell. Open the start menu from start menu or double clicking the shortcut. the window looks like this.

steps.title: Click on the options from the top menu bar, and then click on Configure IDLE.
steps.content: Click on the options from the top menu bar, and then click on Configure IDLE. The new window opens automatically and looks like this.

steps.title: Change font size.
steps.content: Change font size. Now in the fonts/tabs tab there will be option to change the font type/name and below it font size.
